resources.string: This is a Quiz on Birds. A total of %d questions are in this quiz. The questions can be choice based questions (single/multi select option) and also textual questions. When the question is choice based, it can have a max of 4 selectable options. For each question, user will be given the option to reattempt with the help of a hint that gets activated after the first incorrect attempt. Hint will be a picture of the bird shown to the user as a clue to the question. Hence, make sure that the internet connection is fine and avoid using on metered connections. Whether the user wishes to use the hint or not, for each question, two attempts can be made. Please select the number of questions you wish to take (Quiz will have a timer set accordingly)
